name: Landing Platform
description: This is the wide-open roof of the ruined building. Weird purple plants sprint randomly from the web of cracks in the roof's surface. You can still make out the weathered markings that designate this as a platform for arial vehicles. The door to the stairs stands open to the south.

name: Stairwell
description: The top of the stairwell. The stairs descend. To the north, natural light streams in through an open door marked 'EXIT.'

name: Stairwell
description: The stairwell is lit in dim green light, courtesy of barely glowing strips set into the concrete walls. Downstairs there loos to be a door and a landing. It seems a lot brighter upstairs.

name: Landing
description: A landing in the stairwell. LIke the rest of this well, it is dim and green. To the north of the landing is a steel door marked '4.'The stairs lead up, but the down are impassably choked with rubble.
